title: The Importance of Irrigation: Basics Biology and Best Practices

tasks.task: Participate in a webinar on irrigation essentials for greenhouse facility management.
subtasks: Listen to introductions of the presenters, Shea Donald and Marisol Camacho.
Learn about drought stress and its effects on crop development.
Understand factors influencing irrigation system planning.
Discuss preventative measures during irrigation system design.
Compare irrigation challenges between greenhouse and indoor facilities.
Explore advanced irrigation techniques and their benefits.
Identify the importance of avoiding drought stress in greenhouse management.
Ask and answer questions during the Q&A segment.
